title.text: How Many Multiword Expressions do People Know?

abstractContent.text: What is a multiword expression (MWE) and how many are there?
Mark Liberman gave a great invited talk at ACL-89 titled "how many words do people know?" where he spent the entire hour questioning the question.
Many of these same questions apply to multiword expressions.
What does it mean to know?
Rather than answer these questions, this paper will use these questions as Liberman did, as an excuse for surveying how such issues are addressed in a variety of fields:
